mapper.select: select c.cart_id,c.customer_id,c.goods_id,c.goods_nums,g.goods_img,g.goods_content,g.goods_price from cart c join goods g on c.goods_id = g.id where c.customer_id = #{customerId}
mapper.update: update cart set goods_nums = goods_nums + #{goodsNums} where customer_id = #{customerId} and goods_id = #{goodsId}
mapper.select: select * from cart where customer_id = #{customerId} and goods_id = #{goodsId}
